rows.title: Power of three

transcript.eng:
Close your eyes.
Let's use the magic power of 3 to stay present and relax. 

Name 3 sounds you can hear right now.
Name 3 smells you can smell right now.
Name your 3 favourite foods.
What are 3 things you can be grateful for right now.

At the end of a tough day, thinking of 3 things to be grateful for can help us find the courage to try again tomorrow.

rows.transcript:
Close your eyes.
Let's use the magic power of 3 to stay present and relax. 

Name 3 sounds you can hear right now.
Name 3 smells you can smell right now.
Name your 3 favourite foods.
What are 3 things you can be grateful for right now.

At the end of a tough day, thinking of 3 things to be grateful for can help us find the courage to try again tomorrow.

text_1.eng: Self-care is a key parenting tool. It starts with recognising how we feel.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Great. And amazing that you are using this app – it shows your commitment as a parent. Make sure you give yourself credit and praise for what you are doing.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Every day has its highs and lows. Praise yourself for being here and trying – you are moving forward.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Sorry that things are difficult right now. Take a deep breath and know that you are valued.
